item.description:
Google Analytics is a free website tracking software that measures much more than just how much traffic you get to your site. It provides business owners and marketers the necessary business intelligence for growing revenue and driving action in your website. Our guest speaker, Joe Baz, will provide a one hour demo on this web-based tool and demystify the topic of website metrics.

Schedule:
6pm-6:30pm -- Open Networking over wine and snacks
6:30-7:15pm ? Google Analytics Demo
7:15-7:3Opm - Q&A

Demo Topics:
1) Metrics defined: Visitors > Visits > Page Views > Hits
2) Dashboard Customization and Report Views
3) Visitor Tracking: Visitor Loyalty, Location Specific Reports
4) Traffic Sources: Referring Sites and Paid / Organic Search Traffic
5) Content Performance: Page Trending and Site Overlay
6) Conversion Goals: Setting up customer sales / lead funnels for tracking performance
item.name: Marketing Metrics: The Power of Google Analytics
